resources.string: Device acceleration affected by the force of gravity.
Ambient light level in SI lux units.
Distance sensor (in most devices, this only reports a near or far state).
A three dimensional vector indicating the direction and magnitude of gravity.
Acceleration without the effect of gravity.
The rotation vector represents the orientation of the device as a combination of an angle and an axis, in which the device has rotated through an angle Î¸ around an axis [x, y, z].
Relative ambient air humidity in percent.
